Will my coupons work in conjunction with an annual discount?
Yes, coupons will work in conjunction with any annual discount.

Do you offer a web control panel like Virtuozzo?(Temporarily unavailable. Don't worry Vizzo will be back soon!)
Yes! We offer the Vizzo control panel, developed by our friends at TenShips. Vizzo allows you to maintain control of your VPS (You can stop, start, reboot, set hostname, reset root password and view MRTG images).


What type of control panels do you offer?
Hybrid Network:
Direct Admin
Webmin

Premium Network:
Direct Admin
Webmin
cPanel
Plesk

What Operating Systems do you offer?
centos-4-i386-minimal
fedora-core-5-i386-minimal
fedora-core-5-i386-default
fedora-core-4-i386-yum-minimal
fedora-core-4-i386-default
debian-3.1-i386-minimal
debian-4.0-i386-minimal
centos-4-i386-minimal
centos-4.0-i386-default
gentoo-20060317-i686-stage3
ubuntu-6.06-i386-minimal

How long will it take to setup my account?
Normal account setup is 10 minutes or less.

Do you provide the full amount of ram offered on your plans?
Why would we take what you pay for? You will always get the full guaranteed ram.

Can I get additional IPs?
Yes, each additional IP is only $0.99 / month with no setup fees. Adding additional IPs is instant and there is no downtime to your server when adding or removing additional IPs.

Will my OS count against my disk space?
Yes, your operating system files will count against your disk space.
Operating system footprints vary between 125-500 megabytes.

Can I upgrade my VPS to another plan later?
Yes, you may upgrade your VPS at anytime by contacting our sales and billing department. There is no downtime associated with your upgrade.

Can you make me a custom VPS?
Absolutely! Send us an email at Sales@MabusHosting.net for a custom quote. We bend over backwards to meet our customer's needs.

Is adult content allowed?
Yes, as long as your content is considered legal inside the United States.

Is IRC allowed?
No, we do not allow hosting of IRC servers of any sort. This includes bouncers, bots, and daemons.

Can I torrent or host torrents?
No, we do not allow torrenting of any kind on our virtual private servers.

Can I upgrade my kernel?
No, OpenVZ does not allow for any kernel modifications. You will be running a variant of Linux 2.6 which is the latest Linux kernel.

Is there an easy way to restore the VPS to its original state?
Yes, simply create a support ticket and we will restore your VPS back to its original state.

What is the port speed of each VPS?
Hybrid - 10Mbps
Premium - 1000Mbps

Where can I get a downloaded file and test IP?
Hybrid - http://64.27.29.10/speedtest.download.txt
Premium - http://75.126.135.238/speedtest.download.txt

What VPS technology do you use?
OpenVZ

Can I get Webmin preinstalled?
Yes! Webmin is a FREE, open source control panel used for management of domains and hosting, among other things. If you would like for Webmin to be installed, please place the request when ordering or simply create a support ticket.
